nodes.text: Ilum: A Frozen World Hides a Jedi's Secret
"Ilum: A Frozen World Hides a Jedi's Secret" was an article added to Wizards.com on September 20, 2001, that expanded details on the lightsaber crystal planet Ilum for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game.
